name: ShipmatcH
description:
ShipmatcH, the furutistic flight simulator, is here! Fly alone or with friends in a variety of game modes, like racing, dogfighting, and defending the city from an alien mothership invasion.

This full game features:
- Vibrant 3D cities and vast open scenes
- Heaps of different weapons
- Human and alien ships to fly, in multiple classes
- Two mechs for ground-based combat
- Tanks and battleships
- Stacks of exciting game modes
- Fully customisable touch and tilt controls
- Simple training to get you flying like a pro in minutes
- 8-player cooperative and competitive wireless multiplayer modes
- Game Center achievements and 4-player multiplayer
- Unlockable awards, bonus ships, scenes and game modes
